text: My Own America is a World War II song for voice and piano written and composed by Frank C. Huston. The song was self-published in 1940 by F.C. Huston in Indianapolis, IN.Huston, Frank C. 1940. My own America. Marian Anderson Collection of Printed Music. Indianapolis, Ind: F.C. Huston. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library. == References == Category:1940 songs Category:Songs of World War II
title: My Own America
